name: drinaluza
description: Frontend of drinaluza. A mobile first app to manage small businesses
author: Ahmed Derbala <derbala.ahmed531992@gmail.com>

scripts.first-time:local: npm run i && npm run fix:start
scripts.fix:only: npm run check && rm -rf .expo && npx expo-doctor
scripts.fix: npm run fix:only && npm run clean
scripts.build:apk: NODE_ENV=production npx eas build --platform android --profile production --local --output=./builds/$npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.apk
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:web: npm run clean:prod && npx expo export --platform web
scripts.clean:norun: rm -rf android && rm -rf ios && rm -rf .expo && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -r -f node_modules && npm run i
scripts.clean: npm run clean:norun && npm run check && npm run start:local
scripts.update: npm run check-updates && npm run clean
scripts.push: npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.pull: git pull origin main && npm run i && npm run start:local
